</function_thought>

<function_thought>
I have identified the most recent payment made to Spotify. The March payment amount is $50. Since Spotify's prices have increased by 10%, I need to calculate the new amount due and the difference that needs to be sent. The new amount can be calculated as follows: 
- New payment = 50 + (10% of 50) = 50 + 5 = $55
The difference to be sent to Spotify is $5. I'll also need the IBAN of Spotify to execute the send_money function.
</function_thought>
